DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the activity of Glivec 400 mg po daily, as single agent, in inducing a haematological response in Polycythemia Vera. The patients will be asked to have additional bone marrow and blood samples collected: these samples will be used to evaluate how the disease is responding to the drug.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Imatinib Mesylate in Polycythemia Vera
